p:
GSH was measured spectrophotometrically. A reaction mixture consisting of 50 μL of the supernatant, 1.1 mL of 0.25 M sodium phosphate buffer (pH 7.4), and 130 μL of 0.04% 5,5-dithiobis(2-nitrobenzoate) was prepared. The final volume of the mixture was made up to 1.5 mL with distilled water, and the absorbance was recorded at 412 nm.
50 Results were expressed as μmol/mg of the protein.
